Career Profile

Also have solid knowledge of the most popular front-end frameworks and tools, familiar with Node.js and related framework like Express and Koa. I’ve got strong background in software design and architecture, worked on team and tech leader role with team of 4-5 engineers and have good understanding of agile methodologies and software development processes. I Like competitive programming and have good algorithms and data structure understanding.
